1.text: Place a square piece of origami paper flat and rotate it like a diamond.

2.text: Fold the origami paper in half left to right, then unfold it.

3.text: Fold the bottom half of the paper up to the top.

4.text: Fold the top of the triangle down to the bottom edge.

5.text: Fold the sides up diagonally towards the center.

6.text: Fold the left and right corners in to the center.

7.text: Fold the ears out to the left and right at whatever angle you want.

8.text: Fold in the pointy cheeks and chin of your Pikachu’s face.

9.text: Flip the origami over and draw on Pikachu’s face.

10.text: Start with a piece of origami paper flat with the colored side facing you.

11.text: Fold the paper in half along both diagonals and horizontally.

12.text: Fold the paper inwards along the diagonal creases on the bottom half.

13.text: Fold the 2 sides of each triangle up so they meet in the middle.

14.text: Fold the side flaps in to the middle on each side.

15.text: Tuck the folded top flaps into the little pockets on each side.

16.text: Fold the remaining set of top flaps down and to the side to make the ears.

17.text: Blow in the tiny hole at the bottom of the origami to inflate it.

18.text: Draw Pikachu’s face on with markers.
